'''Theo''' was a young [[Pre-Númenóreans|Southlander]] of [[Tirharad]] in the [[Mordor|Southlands]] of [[Middle-earth]]. Theo was invented for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'' by [[Amazon Studios]] and he is portrayed by [[Tyroe Muhafidin]].<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://www.imdb.com/title/tt9788618/fullcredits|articlename=Full Cast & Crew|dated=|website=IMDB|accessed=31 July 2022}}</ref>

== History ==
Theo is the son of [[Bronwyn]], and he is at first skeptical of the Elf [[Arondir|Arondir's]] feelings toward his mother.
